thread.title: NOVAK-NADAL STOP BY IN BANGKOK FOR TENNIS EXHIBITION
thread.title_full: NOVAK-NADAL STOP BY IN BANGKOK FOR TENNIS EXHIBITION

title: NOVAK-NADAL STOP BY IN BANGKOK FOR TENNIS EXHIBITION
text:
Home » sports » NOVAK-NADAL STOP BY IN BANGKOK FOR TENNIS EXHIBITION NOVAK-NADAL STOP BY IN BANGKOK FOR TENNIS EXHIBITION Lerpong Amsa-ngiam October 1, 2015 1:00 am 
Djokovic and Nadal arrive in Bangkok. Current and former world No 1 Novak Djokovic and Rafael Nadal arrived Bangkok this morning for the "Back to Thailand Nadal vs Djokovic" due tomorrow at the Hua Mark Indoor Stadium. Both will hold a press conference this afternoon at JW Marriott hotel and are scheduled to shop for local OTOP products at the EmQuartier. The reigning US Open champion Djokovic and the 14-time Major winner Nadal will be stopping by at the Grand Palace tomorrow at 10.15 am to sign a well-wishes book for His Majesty the King and visit Prime Minister Prayut h Chan-ocha at the Government House. Prior to the exhibition, a special mixed doubles exhibition match will serve as an official farewell event for Danai Udomchoke. Danai will pair with Noppawan Lertcheewakarn to play Paradorn Srichaphan and Tamarine Tanasugarn in the best of nine game format. 281 Viewed
